author: emman655
title: Good choice for canary wharf and stratford
text: Hotel is good value, clean, comfortable,quiet and convenient for docklands light railway. I booked quite late and got a room plus wifi for 1 adult (no breakfast) for Â£80. Room was very spacious. NB I did not use the TV so can't comment on that.
